info.title: Magento Asynchronous Guest REST endpoints - All inclusive

post.description: Add gift card to the cart.
Create customer account. Perform necessary business operations like sending email.
Check if given email is associated with a customer account in given website.

websiteId.description: If not set, will use the current websiteId

put.description: Send an email to the customer with a password reset link.

post.description: Reset customer password.

email.description: If empty value given then the customer will be matched by the RP token.

post.description: Enable an customer or guest user to create an empty cart and quote for an anonymous customer.
Assign a specified billing address to a specified cart.
Select a given collection point for checkout.
Select a given pickup location for checkout.

put.description: Set shipping/billing methods and additional data for cart and collect totals for guest.
Save a customer's search for collection points.

delete.description: Delete a customer's search for collection points.
Delete a coupon from a specified cart.

put.description: Add a coupon by code to a specified cart.

post.description: Handle selected delivery option.
Estimate shipping by address and return list of available shipping methods
Set the gift message for an entire order.
Set the gift message for a specified item in a specified shopping cart.
Add/update the specified cart item.

delete.description: Remove the specified item from the specified cart.

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.description: The item ID of the item to be removed.

put.description: Place an order for a specified cart.

post.description: Set payment information and place order for a specified cart.

put.description: Add a specified payment method to a specified shopping cart.

post.description: Set payment information for a specified cart.
Calculate quote totals based on address and shipping method.
Estimate shipping
Create access token for admin given the admin credentials.
Create access token for admin given the customer credentials.
Proxy handler for guest place order

default_shipping.description: If this address is default shipping address.

default_billing.description: If this address is default billing address

asynchronous-operations-data-async-respo.description: Interface AsyncResponseInterface Temporary data object to give response from webapi async router

request_items.description: The list of request items with status data.

asynchronous-operations-data-item-status.description: ItemStatusInterface interface Temporary object with status of requested item. Indicate if entity param was Accepted|Rejected to bulk schedule

data_hash.description: md5 hash of entity params array.

gift_cards_amount_used.description: Cards amount used in quote currency.

base_gift_cards_amount_used.description: Cards amount used in base currency.
